GETALLWORKITEMS: Select [System.Id], [System.Title], [System.State] From WorkItems Where ([System.WorkItemType] = 'User Story' OR [System.WorkItemType] = 'Bug') order by [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority] asc, [System.CreatedDate] desc
GETWORKITEMSSINCELASTRUN: Select [System.Id], [System.Title], [System.State] From WorkItems Where ([System.WorkItemType] = 'User Story' OR [System.WorkItemType] = 'Bug') AND ([System.CreatedDate] >= '{0}' OR [System.ChangedDate] >= '{0}') order by [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority] asc, [System.CreatedDate] desc
